e="preserve">Nina Aleksandrovna Andreyeva (, 12 October 1938 – 24 July 2020) was a Russian chemist, teacher, author, political activist, and social critic. She criticized General Secretary Mikhail Gorbachev and his closest supporters for not being true communists.
Andreyeva died in St. Petersburg, Russia on 24 July 2020 at the age of 81.
